For the next 48 hours in celebration of Saint Patrick's Day we are giving everyone a huge discount on our TinyKVM London service.

Here's what you get:

128 MB Dedicated RAM
3 GB Dedicated SAS10k Disk Space
500 GB Transfer on our multihomed premium bandwidth blend

Hosted in the London Docklands, at the heart of the UK Internet.

We are offering this for only $20 per year, a $15 savings.

Order at http://tinykvm.com/ use promo code GREEN
